This repository contains all analysis code for the paper "The winner's curse under dependence: repairing empirical Bayes using convoluted densities" by Stijn Hawinkel, Olivier Thas and Steven Maere. All data used are available [online](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1011161.s013) and are downloaded by the code in the notebook.
